Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Noble
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Noble.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Division, Elston and Milwaukee, over normal route, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Noble.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Northbound Reroute near Dearborn/Illinois
ShortDescription: Northbound 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Illinois, State, Ontario and Dearborn: due to, street blockage near Dearborn/Illinois.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Northbound #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Illinois, State, Ontario and Dearborn: due to, street blockage near Dearborn/Illinois.

Southbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Bryn Mawr

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?
